components/products/newshipping:
If an order is placed before 1pm EST on a business day we ship the order the same day.

If it is placed after 12pm EST or over the weekend, we will ship the order out the following business day. Depending where you are located in the 48 contiguous states FedEx will take 2-5 business days to deliver the tires to you from our Allentown, PA location.

For a more specific tire frame contact us via e-mail info@prioritytire.com or telephone 1-866-440-0177.
components/products/newvsused:
New vs Used

Why Buy New vs. Used Tires?

Save $100â€™s Buying High Quality Used Tires For Your Car Or Truck

The advantages of new tires are that they are brand new and covered under warranties by the manufacturer and some even offer road hazard warranties. Though with these bells and whistles comes the high dollar amount which can be detracting and not so ideal when in a financial pinch or when you leased the vehicle.

With used tires the disadvantage is that they are not new and are not covered by a manufacturer warranty but, advantage of going used is that it is lighter on your wallet which the extra money saved can be put towards labor or installation costs. Also if you're currently leasing your vehicle you wouldn't want to pay for brand new tires to end up not even using the tires you're investing in. Used tires are an eco-friendly cost-wise alternative that are still great for the road and fits the bill.

Comparison of a popular set of 4 Michelin Latitude Tour Tires

  • NEW TIRES NEW TIRES

    Set of 4: $643.96

    10/32 tread depth
  • USED TIRES USED TIRES

    Set of 4: $289.95

    8/32 tread depth
Save $354.01

    Why Buy From Us

    Fast & Free Shipping

    We understand that our customers live busy lives and canâ€™t wait for packages that take weeks to arrive. Thatâ€™s why we provide fast and FREE shipping and delivery for all of our customers.

    Orders placed before 1 PM EST, will be shipped out the same day. The delivery time depends on your location. We ensure that all orders are shipped out in a timely manner and are working diligently at getting your orders to you as soon as possible with FedEx Home Delivery and FedEx Ground.

    • FREE and FAST shipping in the 48 contiguous states
    • FedEx Home Delivery and FedEx Ground
    • Delivery between 2-6 business days
    • SAME DAY shipping of order placed before the cut-off time
  • 90 Days Money Back Guarantee

    Why Buy From Us

    90 Day Money Back Guarantee

    We at Priority Tire stand behind our products. We are confident in the quality of our tires. We provide a 90 day money back guarantee with all purchases. No hassle and free returns.

    If you have any issue with your purchase, just contact us and we will resolve it for you! We can be reached at 866-440-0177 or at info@prioritytire.com. You can also chat with one of our representatives on the website.

    • No Hassle - FREE Returns

    Risk Free Buying No Hassle Returns

    Ordered the wrong size? The incorrect model? You no longer have use for them? These issues wonâ€™t be a problem anymore! We offer a hassle-free return process with all orders. Unused and unmounted tires can be returned for a replacement or refund!

    Contact our Customer Service Office for more details at 866-440-0177 or send us an email to info@prioritytire.com! Please state your intention for a return and our representatives will be able to help you out in a timely and efficient manner.

    • Efficient resolutions to problems

    Our large selection of tire models and sizes are offered at the lowest possible prices available on the market. We keep our prices at a competitive rate, which ensures our customers are getting excellent value for their money with each purchase.

Compatible Vehicles

IMPORTANT INFORMATION: Please note this is Original Equipment (O.E.) tire size only. The O.E. size is determined by the year, make, model and options of the vehicle. Original Equipment size data is the best information we currently have available to us. Priority Tire LLC is not responsible for fitment errors. The most important aspect of purchasing a tire is its size, which cannot vary. It is buyer's responsibility to verify the tire size information. It is buyer's responsibility to verify whether a specific tire is suitable for a specific vehicle. However, this tire size may be fitted on other vehicles as well. To ensure that you are purchasing the correct tire size for your vehicle, please check the size of your currently mounted tires (locate on the tire's sidewall). The tire's sidewall also features the speed and load rating, indicating the speed and load capacity of the specific tire. The speed and load index can differ from the tires you currently have mounted on your vehicle up to a degree. Please check your vehicle's Owner's Manual or consult with your mechanic regarding the changes of your tire's speed rating and load index. If you have any questions regarding your tire size , speed rating and load index please contact us prior to purchasing and confirm with certified auto technician of any variance in speed and load index and sizes.

components/products/productdisclosure:
Product Disclosure

We do everything we can to assure that the tires you receive are safe for the road. Some our our used tires may have been professionally repaired (safe spots only, meaning no sidewall repairs). This includes patches or stem patches.

We inspect our tires twice, both visually and using air to test them.

While we do not warrant or represent the quality of any of those repairs, we do however guarantee there have been no sidewall repairs.

If a tire fails it will be discarded and not posted for sale. Once the tire is sold the process is ran through again to make sure that we are only sending out quality used tires.

Rim not included, tire only!
components/products/usedtakeoffdetails:
Inspection Results

This item has been air pressure and visually inspected by our staff!

Every single one of our tires goes through 2 inspections - when it arrives and before shipment.

Tires are inspected for holes, bubbles, dry rot, uneven wear and air pressure. We only sell tires manufactured after 2011

It is possible that a tire has been professionally repaired with a stem patch according to RMA guidelines.

Our Inspection Process

We will do a visual inspection as well as a pressure test to each and every single one of our tires when it arrives.

We will repair any damage to R.M.A.(Rubber Manufacturers Association) guidelines.

That means:

  • The hole must be in the tread section of the tire
  • The hole must not exceeding 6mm in diameter
  • It must be repaired using both a stem and patch
  • We will NOT sell tires manufactured before 2011

To alleviate any concerns you may have, we have a full 90 Day, No Hassle Return Policy.

Read some of our reviews and you'll see that keep our word.
